Plug-ins.name: Port Mapper
Plug-ins.description: Use Port Mapper to assist hosting games bypassing network issues preventing you from doing so otherwise.

Plug-ins.name: Tab Out Unsuppress
Plug-ins.description: Prevents Halo from pausing video when tabbed out.

Plug-ins.name: Halo Graphics Update
Plug-ins.description: Raises the limits of seeing through the BSP

Plug-ins.name: Moon Mode
Plug-ins.description: Map mode extension that reduces gravity to 33%.

Plug-ins.name: Faster Joining
Plug-ins.description: Removes the unnecessary fade-in timer to join the game faster.

Plug-ins.name: Increase Visible Object Limit
Plug-ins.description: This plugin quadruples the visible object limit, allowing more objects to be  rendered at once.

Plug-ins.name: Aspect Ratio FOV Fixer
Plug-ins.description: This plugin adapts the camera FOV to the user's aspect ratio.

Plug-ins.name: Shader Workaround
Plug-ins.description: Use if you can't see rocks or trees when pixel shaders are turned on.

Plug-ins.name: Rocket Surfing
Plug-ins.description: Stand near a rocket to ride it.

Plug-ins.name: Halo+
Plug-ins.description: This plugin fixes Intel Integrated Graphics Shaders, Reduces Halos CPU usage from 100% to 1-3% when it's in the background, Fixes a bug in El Capitan where Halo would crash when in window mode, Enables 16x ansiotropical filtering, Increases the maximum bsp poly limit and Increases the number of objects that can be visible at once
